mapper.select: SELECT finPrdNm AS productName, hdlInst AS institutionName, irt AS interestRate, lnLmt AS loanLimit, rltSite AS siteUrl FROM low_income_financial_products WHERE dsrCheck = 'N' AND CAST(lnLmt AS DECIMAL) >= #{principal} AND #{userDsr} <= #{dsrLimit} ORDER BY CAST(irt AS DECIMAL) ASC LIMIT 10
